Hellplague/ Malice/ Necross:
 
Hellplague stepped in after Blacknightmare, and stood by the door.  She would step further if Unicron wished her to.
 
Malice finished his drink and left it on the table.  He got up and left the room to return to his.  On his way he ran into Necross.  Necross gave Malice a distasteful sneer, but said nothing.  Both bots went their ways, and Malice returned to his room.
 
Necross entered the mess hall and ordeed himself a drink.
"Those femmes and their new toy... Perhaps Unicron should keep a shorter leash on them."
